channel.title: e-commerce news and technical seo guidelines
channel.description: e-commerce news and technical seo guidelines

item.title: How human-centered analytics is driving improvement in healthcare
item.description:
How human-centered analytics is driving improvement in healthcare

Global chief analytics officer, EY The secret to analytics success is not technical prowess, it's the human element. Fresh data insights only truly matter if you can use them to influence people's behavior. Many organizations have reached a point where their ability to generate data exceeds their ability to consume that information.

item.title: How to Measure Customer Emotions
item.description:
How to Measure Customer Emotions

Some businesses look at the bottom line with customers. Companies that are and will be most successful going forward will optimize something besides margins and profits: The Net Emotional Value. What is the NEV? The Net Emotional Value (NEV) refers to the single number that represents the emotional value you provide to your customers.

item.title: Why Online Video Is a Must-Have for Your Mobile Marketing Strategy
item.description:
Why Online Video Is a Must-Have for Your Mobile Marketing Strategy

When consumers today need or want something, they reflexively reach for their phones. They want the right answer, right away. Is there room for brands in these moments? Our latest research says yes. Mobile viewers are in fact more likely to watch, share, and feel connected to ads and branded video.

item.title: Alibaba Buys Lazada | PYMNTS.com
item.description:
Alibaba Buys Lazada | PYMNTS.com

Alibaba - Asia's ranking eCommerce powerhouse - has announced its intention to buy a controlling stake in Lazada Group, a Southeast Asia-focused eCommerce startup. The shares in Lazada will run Alibaba about $500 million, with an additional $500 million marked for buying out the stakes of current Lazada shareholders.

item.title: The Biggest Mistake Companies Make During a Website Redesign
item.description:
The Biggest Mistake Companies Make During a Website Redesign

Let's get straight to the point. A website redesign is no small undertaking. Every team, from developers/IT and design, to marketing and sales, has to be on board and understand what's expected of them. Everyone contributes.

item.title: Updated Google Quality Rater Guidelines: No More Supplementary Content, Emphasis on E-A-T
item.description:
Updated Google Quality Rater Guidelines: No More Supplementary Content, Emphasis on E-A-T

Here we go again! A brand new version of the Google Quality Rater Guidelines has been released. With this version we see some interesting changes. Most noticeably is the de-emphasis of supplementary content, surprising since previous versions have stressed the importance of the additional supplementary content there is on the page - or the negative ...

item.title: Planning an Effective Content Marketing Program - Podcast
item.description:
Planning an Effective Content Marketing Program - Podcast

Companies that struggle to achieve their goals with content marketing usually don't have documented strategies. In this episode of Content Matters Podcast, Andy and Barry discuss how and why to create an all-important mission statement, which will give your marketing programs the focus it needs to be effective.

item.title: Customer Journey Mapping Defined
item.description:
Customer Journey Mapping Defined

Engaging with customers today has never been so convoluted. With multiple paths to purchase across myriad channels and devices, understanding the 'when,' 'how,' and 'why' of moving customers from point A to point B has become ever so critical.

item.title: Coca cola Creates First Ever Drinkable Advertising Campaign
item.description:
Coca cola Creates First Ever Drinkable Advertising Campaign

" This is called a Real Branding Campaign " As ‪#‎coca_cola‬ says, "NEXT TIME YOU'RE THIRSTY, DRINK AN AD" A drinkable advertising creates the illusion that you actually taste the campaign and that's why they collaborated with Shazam, helping the audience enjoy a Coke Zero with the help of technology.

item.title: Conversion Optimization & SEO: Traffic without Conversion is a Traffic Accident
item.description:
Conversion Optimization & SEO: Traffic without Conversion is a Traffic Accident

I have a true story. Recently, I was meeting with a group of SEOs (really smart people). We were talking about geeky SEO stuff, when someone tossed out the word "CRO." "What's CRO?" one SEO asked. There is a dearth of knowledge among SEOs regarding CRO. I totally get this.
